amendment.description: Amendment adds $300,000 to the funds appropriated to the Justice Department in order to investigate the existence of Nazi war criminals living in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase by $300,000 funds appropriated in the bill for Justice Department legal expenses to investigate the existence of Nazi war criminals living in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ackerman amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
